attributes.action: stop the liverpool care plan being used under another name and stop nil by mouth and giving patients so much drugs they cannot respond
attributes.additional_details: End the murders that are being done on the Liverpool care pathway stop it being used under other names an stop them from giving patients so many drugs they cant respond and stop nil by mouth if the patient wants food or drink an if they cannot give it to them threw there mouth they should have to apply it some other way stop them from taking peoples loved ones away
